tagline: Conversation design that handles the happy path and the 'I didn't get that' path equally well
pros: Conversation flows that feel natural, not robotic
Fallback design that saves frustrated users
Persona consistency across hundreds of responses
cons: Designs conversations, doesn't build the tech underneath
Can agonize over word choices when speed matters
Needs real user data to do his best work

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
